Gail Mackenzie-Smith in Electric Lit wrote a Dear John letter breaking up with Wordle.

 
Read more
articles.title: The Sunday Papers

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
There's no perfect time to release a video game, but if I were deciding when to release one, do you know when I'd do it? Alongside the largest blockbusters of the year, at a time when everyone is broke from buying presents, and on the same day as a huge awards show is distracting the industry's media. 

Ballionaire apparently shares my thinking. The pachinko-inspired roguelike is launching on December 10th.

 
Read more
articles.title: Ballionaire, the physics roguelike in which you build pachinko boards, drops on December 10th

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
I had a few merry evenings playing Escape Simulator back in 2022. Of the co-op escape room games I've played, it was the best, both in terms of its relatively neutral framing (with little heavyhanded storytelling) and its pretty solid puzzle design. The game was expanded in the time since with a versus mode and several crossover DLC, and now there comes a sequel.

Escape Simulator 2 will explore "darker escape room themes", looks visually more detailed, and comes with a new editor for those who wish to design their own escape rooms.

 
Read more
articles.title: Escape Simulator 2 announced with promises of Dracula's castle and an improved escape room editor

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
This happened on Thursday, but we were busy with other, less interesting news. Late or not, I can't let it pass unremarked upon: Caves Of Qud, the vast, weird roguelike which has been in development for 17 years, hit version 1.0. It brings multiple endings to the game, a revised UI, improved tutorials and much more.

 
Read more
articles.title: Caves Of Qud, one of the most exciting development projects in PC gaming, hit 1.0 this week

articles.author: RPS
articles.description:
You could open today's door, sure. You could also blow it up with an explosive, though. Or shoulder-barge your way through the wall beside it. Or plant some C4 on the ceiling and go up and over. Or I think that's a load-bearing pillar over there - may as well just bring down the entire advent calendar to find out what's behind today's door.

 
Read more
articles.title: The RPS Advent Calendar 2024, December 7th

articles.author: Ollie Toms
articles.description:
Morning, all. Hope you're keeping those game-playing hands nice and toasty this winter. You can do it however you like. Wear gloves, huff on them, sit on them, give a fluffy cat a good squeeze. I personally like to clasp a mug of almost-too-hot coffee while I gaze at my Steam library wondering where the hours have gone. To each their own. Here's what we're all clicking on this weekend!
 Read more
articles.title: What are we all playing this weekend?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
The protagonists of two of my all time favourite RPGs share something in common. Both (the best Final Fantasy game) Final Fantasy 8’s Squall and The Witcher 3’s Geralt simply cannot get enough of leaving their friends and the entire world in mortal peril while they sneak in a quick round of cards, and I love them for it. Way back when the Wild Hunt released, there was a special edition kicking about that gave you a few decks for Gwent - the fleshed-out, playable card distraction that ended up being responsible for some of the game’s best moments. I pined for those decks, but I never acquired them. Now, Hatchette Board Games is putting out a full physical edition of Gwent next year.
The set contains "over 400 cards and a playmat" for £44/$39.99. I’m still recovering from various Fantasy Flight LCGs, so my value sense for this stuff might be a bit skewed, but that strikes me as incredibly reasonable. A good Gwent deck consists of only about 25 cards. They’re not bad cards, either! I’ve got a real pet hate for tabletop versions of videogames that just use in-engine screenshots for the cards, but these ones look to have the proper artwork from the game on them:
Read more
articles.title: The Witcher 3’s Gwent is getting a full physical game next year, so you too can play cards while the world burns

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Where were you during the Summer of Doronko Wanko? Why, I remember it like it was March, and not actually Summer, when the delightful free game about a mucky pomeranian was unleashed into the world. Yep, yep. It was definitely March. Roughly translating to ‘covered in mud doggy’, the game set you the task of racking up tangible financial damage to your owner’s house by getting mud everywhere - first by normal dog means, and then with giant mud cannons. You can grab it for free on Steam here.
It stole our hearts, it did. And talking of stealing things and having a good time doing it, it’s also releasing on the Nintendo Switch soon, which means the Steam version of Doronko Wanko is getting some free DLC to celebrate. It isn’t arriving until next Spring, but it’s bringing three new mystery dog breeds with it when it does.
Read more
articles.title: Canine filth-criminal Doronko Wanko is getting some new dog breeds to cause tangible financial damage with

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
If you’d told me last year that face of all-out, GPU venerating, fully ray-traced PC game visual excess would be that of a de-aged Harrison Ford, I’d have asked which exact colour of paint you’d been eating. And yet here we are, with Indiana Jones and the Great Circle loving its ray tracing so much that the effects can’t ever be fully switched off.
Read more
articles.title: Mandatory ray tracing makes Indiana Jones and the Great Circle pretty yet brutal, like Indy himself

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Every fascist in this game has a cold. The Hitlerites and blackshirts of Indiana Jones And The Great Circle sneeze and cough as they patrol the dig sites of Gizeh, or the marble corridors of the Vatican. Although this is the Machine Games' clever way of letting you know where your enemies are at all times, it is also mildly funny, as if all the Nazis have been secretly kissing each other, spreading the same rhinovirus from Italy to Egypt to Nepal and beyond. More than that, it's a stubborn reminder that, despite the many hours of perfectly motion-captured cinematics that accompany all this, you are still playing a video game. A snotty tissue that separates the Indy of taut two-hour cinema and the Indy of a sweeping first-person punch 'em up that will take days to complete. All this is to say, you will notice the difference. But that might not matter; they're both still Indiana Jones. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle review: a grand adventure that keeps faith with the movies

articles.author: RPS
articles.description:
Open a door, then back here again, open a door, then back here again. It's as if we're caught in some infernal loop. Thankfully we get to talk to you, our attractive friends, in the moments between. 

OK, ready to go again. Let's open the door.

 
Read more
articles.title: The RPS Advent Calendar 2024, December 6th

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
When last we left myself, on a mission to survive S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 by weaponising its monsters instead of shooting its guns, my one-with-nature experiment was yielding mixed results. At best. I’d successfully lured some bandits into the deadly lair of a bucket-tossing Poltergeist, but several attempts at more actively siccing mutated pigs on the Zone’s human baddies had all failed, even when I’d seemed to actually tame one.
Now, my only friend lay dead at my feet, and I’m in dire need of some new beasts to master. And some cash. It turns out that a fighting style that involves letting shopping trolley-sized swine creatures chew on my heels is bad for the ol’ HP, and having recently blown my savings on half a sausage, I’m forced to shift focus from my current debt collection mission towards a means to fill my own coffers.
Read more
articles.title: The Beastmaster of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2, part two: the Zone bites back

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I think It’s safe to say that Trigger Happy Interactive’s upcoming survival horror Total Chaos is a bit of a palette change from their last offering - the frenetic, neon-drenched, chainsaw-legged Turbo Overkill. Still, it’s not often we see psychological horror combined with ultraviolence, and anything that gives off even a whiff of Condemned: Criminal Origins has my attention.
Total Chaos started life as a popular Doom 2 mod, and while I dare the say the limitations of that game sell the atmosphere a little better than this much sleeker update, I certainly trust Trigger Happy enough to make the most of the new engine. The game is set in New Oasis, a “once bustling haven for coal miners” that is now most definitely not bustling, nor haven-like.
Read more
articles.title: Total Chaos is a grimy horror FPS from the Turbo Overkill devs

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The Horsemen of the Apocalypse are War, Famine, Death and Pestilence. The Drivers of the Apocalypse are Grappling Hooks, Vehicle Swapping, Boss Battles and Upgrades. You'll get to meet all four of the latter in the video game of the same name, a combat racer from Dinosaurs Are Better (citation needed) and their publishers Bonus Stage.
 
Read more
articles.title: Drivers Of The Apocalypse combines Mad Max with the vehicle-grappling of Just Cause

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
The demimimise of Mimimi means I'm now on the lookout for my next opportunity to crouch behind a hedge, distract a man with a stone or coin, and then choke him unconscious. (And in the game.) Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream looks like a worthy candidate. Announced last year, there's now a new trailer showing the isometric (isometrish?) narrative stealth in action.

 
Read more
articles.title: Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream is a stealth 'em up that's a bit Desperados, a bit Dunwall

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Some day, somebody's going to make a cosy or wholesome submarine game, in which the submarine does not sprout leaks, does not run out of O2, and is never once invaded by any octopod-raddled zombies. That day is not today. Today there is only icy darkness and suffocation. Say "hello" and probably also "AIEEEEBLubLBBLBLBL" to Darkwater, a new co-op horror extraction game in which you brave the frigid oceans of an alien moon.

 
Read more
articles.title: In ocean co-op horror Darkwater you can ride a torpedo through an infested submarine's hull

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Nightdive, you done good. The Thing: Remastered is an ultra-sharp and commendably playable update to a game that history will remember as ‘actually a pretty good pick at Choices when you really just popped in to get some Revels but got embarrassed when the till staffer said “is that everything?” in a tone that could have been neutral but equally could have been a damning indictment of your character’.
I’m being slightly facetious here, of course. History actually remembers Computer Artworks’s 2002 shooty horror game for how incredibly ambitious and conceptually inventive its proto-sus social squad system was. In homage to the body-snatching alien paranoia of Carpenter’s 1982 horror classic, The Thing tasks you with not just assembling and directing a squad, but keeping them from breaking down or turning on you - in fear you might be hosting the titular molecular stowaway.
Read more
articles.title: The Thing: Remastered review: a fantastic remaster of a game best observed from a distance

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Dogubomb’s Blue Prince boasts my favourite shapeshifting house in a video game, which admittedly isn’t setting a very high bar. Perhaps surprisingly, most video game houses do not shapeshift. Despite being made out of pure imagination and carbon emissions, they remain nostalgically shackled to the limitations of brick, mortar and Euclidean geometry. Blue Prince’s abode is different. It is a house made of house. You’ll actually design the layout yourself every time you wander through it, picking from a selection of mismatched room types whenever you open a door.
  
Read more
articles.title: Probably-magnificent mystery house puzzler Blue Prince will release in spring 2025

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: V dnešním díle postřehů se nejprve podíváme na hattrick od Ivanti, zranitelnost v AMD-SEV a chybu v imagebuilderu pro OpenWrt. Poté na některé aktivity ruských hackerů a severokorejských podvodníků.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: Ivanti dává hattrick třemi kritickými zranitelnostmi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: OpenMandriva ROME 24.12 přináší nový spin s prostředím COSMIC. Webový prohlížeč Iceweasel byl portován na operační systém Haiku. Banan-OS je pod BSD licencí vyvíjený hobby operační systém, napsaný v jazyce C++.
articles.title: OpenMandriva má svůj COSMIC Spin, Iceweasel byl portován na Haiku

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Intel přidává Round Robin Strict pro Battlemage/Xe2 a nové řízení spotřeby pro Lunar Lake, Ubuntu 25.04 vyjde s jádrem Linux 6.14, vyšla vývojová verze Wine 10.0-rc2 opravující nejen Borderlands 3.
articles.title: KDE vylepšuje škálování UI, Intel podporu Lunar Lake a Battlemage

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: První karty druhé generace Intelu zamířily na trh a s nimi se objevily i první testy. Nevypadá špatně, což konstatují i někteří testeři, jenž strávili poslední roky kritizováním Intelu, často oprávněným.
articles.title: Intel Arc B580: slušná grafická karta s dobrým linuxovým potenciálem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: Collatzova domněnka, fascinující matematický problém, zůstává nevyřešená. V roce 2020 byla ale výpočetně ověřena pro všechna čísla až do velikosti 2⁶⁸. Ukážeme si, jak toho bylo dosaženo.
articles.title: Výpočetní ověření Collatzovy domněnky až do velikosti 2⁶⁸

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Se serializačním formátem nazvaným MessagePack jsme se již na stránkách Roota jednou setkali. Dnes si ukážeme, jak se tento formát používá v jazyku Python, a to včetně serializace N-dimenzionálních polí knihovny NumPy.
articles.title: Využití serializačního formátu MessagePack v Pythonu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Michal Hrušecký)
articles.description: Projekt OpenWrt nedávno oznámil přechod ze stávajícího formátu balíčků opkg na apk. Co to znamená pro běžného uživatele? Jak se tyto dva formáty a nástroje s nimi pracující vlastně liší?
articles.title: OpenWrt přechází z opkg na balíčky apk – jaký je v tom vlastně rozdíl?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Pravidelná středeční sonda do světa software. Dnes se společně podíváme na nástroj pro správu ACME certifikátů, vytvoříme animaci pro web a nakonec si budeme řídit zabezpečení síťového provozu.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (11. 12. 2024): rychlé mazání souborů ve více vláknech

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Billu Gatesovi se připisuje výrok „640K ought to be enough for anybody“, který ovšem pravděpodobně nikdy neřekl. Na počítačích IBM PC se skutečně dlouhou dobu bojovalo s omezenými možnostmi adresování většího paměťového rozsahu.
articles.title: 640K by mělo stačit každému: skutečně?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: Dnes se podíváme, jak fungují bezeztrátové nebo téměř bezeztrátové formáty obrazu. K tomu bude ale nejprve třeba seznámit se s tím, co to jsou prediktory. Poté si podrobně rozebereme formáty GIF, PNG a JPEG-LS.
articles.title: Bezeztrátové formáty obrazu: GIF, PNG a JPEG-LS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Organizátoři komunitní konference Bratislava OpenCamp vyhlásili datum konání příštího ročníku. Ten se uskuteční 5. dubna 2025 opět na FIIT STU v Bratislave. Prvý aj druhý ročník konferencie sa tešil účasti okolo 300 ľudí, veríme že tretí ročník bude ešte lákavejší, doufají pořadatelé a dodávají, že kapacita je přibližně 650 míst.
articles.title: Bratislava OpenCamp proběhne 5. dubna 2025, hledají se přednášející

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V současnosti se můžeme setkat se síťovými kartami 10 GbE i na poměrně slabším HW. Na serveru cnx-software například měřili propustnost 10 GbE sítě mezi dvěma miniPC s procesorem Intel N100. Ten při bi-directional testu už nestíhal a jen jedno jádro procesoru bylo vytížené na 100 %.
articles.title: Měření propustnosti sítě iperf3 s více vlákny

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Bill Gates před dvěma týdny doporučil na svých stránkách čtyři knížky, které podle něj objasňují smysl světa kolem nás.
articles.title: Bill Gates doporučuje čtyři knížky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: COBOL (COmmon Business Oriented Language) je 65 let starý programovací jazyk, který se patrně dočká zařazení do kompilátoru GCC. V současnosti GCC podporuje jazyky C, C++, Fortran, Rust, Go, D, Ada a Modula-2.
articles.title: COBOL míří do GCC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jak jsme nedávno psali, emulace NUMA na Raspberry Pi 4 a 5 vede ke znatelně většímu výkonu obzvláště ve vícevláknových aplikacích. Před časem bylo aktualizováno jádro, takže pro emulaci NUMA již nebylo potřeba používat experimentální jádro.
articles.title: Větší výkon s NUMA pro všechny Raspberry Pi 4 a 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Přijďte prozkoumat tajuplný svět hackingu a množství jeho jednotlivých zákoutí. Průvodcem na této cestě vám bude zkušený etický hacker s mnohaletou praxí, který se s vámi podělí o své zkušenosti. Stačí navštívit naše školení Hacking v praxi 1, na kterém proniknete do světa útočníků a jejich obětí. Školení proběhne online ve dnech 26. až 28. února.
articles.title: Hacking v praxi: od sociálního inženýrství po bankomaty (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po dvou letech vývoje byla podle plánu vydána nejnovější verze desktopového prostředí Xfce 4.20. Velká část novinek je soustředěna okolo lepší podpory Waylandu při zachování kompatibility s X11. Kromě toho jsou k dispozici nové funkce, hromada opravených chyb a různá drobná vylepšení.
articles.title: Xfce 4.20 přidává nové funkce a vylepšuje podporu Waylandu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Google oznámil kvantovou nadvládu již před pěti lety se svým čipem Sycamore s 53 qubity. Nyní přichází další supravodivý čip Willow (vrba) se 105 qubity a lepší opravou kvantových chyb. S jeho pomocí bylo vyřešena jedna úloha za méně než pět minut. Ta stejná úloha by největšímu superpočítači trvala 1025 let, což o mnoho řádů překračuje předpokládané stáří vesmíru 1,4×1010 let.
articles.title: Google vylepšuje kvantovou nadvládu čipem Willow se 105 qubity

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V žebříčku oblíbenosti linuxových distribucí na serveru DistroWatch došlo ke změně na prvním a druhém místě. Nyní je první Linux Mint a druhý je MX Linux. Obě distribuce se soustředí na začátečníky.
articles.title: Nejoblíbenější distribucí je podle DistroWatch Linux Mint před MX Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávno Linus Torvalds odmítl do jádra úrovně architektury x86_64, ale překlad s přepínačem -march=native již nevadí. Tento přepínač způsobí, že se automaticky použijí vlastnosti procesoru, na kterém kompilace běží.
articles.title: Jádro bude mít -march=native

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: Minulý týždeň Meta vydala novú verziu svojho vlajkového jazykového modelu Llama 3.3. Nová Llama 3.3 70B ponúka výkon porovnateľný s väčším modelom Llama 3.1 405B. Nový model je výrazne menší, rýchlejší a lacnejší. Model je optimalizovaný pre nákladovú efektívnosť, čo ho robí prístupnejším pre vývojárov a výskumníkov. Ak máme veriť oficiálnym údajom, Llama 3.3 70B model je 25-krát lacnejší ako jeho konkurent GPT-4o mini. Llama 3.3 v súčasnosti podporuje len textový mód. Jazykový model Llama 3.3 70B je možné si vyskúšať na high-endových notebookoch a desktopoch.
articles.title: Vyšli nové jazykové modely Llama 3.3 a Gemini 2.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Firefox podporoval Do Not Track (DNT) již 13 let. Bohužel webové stránky na signál DNT nereagují, naopak jej používají s ostatními nastaveními a rozšířeními k identifikaci uživatele (fingerprinting). Z tohoto důvodu Apple odstranil DNT ze Safari již v roce 2019. V Chrome a jeho forcích zatím DNT zůstává.
articles.title: Do Not Track končí ve Firefoxu 135

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili CentOS Stream 10 s kódovým jménem Coughlan. CentOS Stream 10 vytváří upstream pro Red Hat Enterprise Linuxu 10, ze kterého jsou vytvářeny minoritní verze RHEL 10. Představuje tedy náhled toho, co se chystá pro budoucí verze RHEL 10. Tato verze by měla být udržována přibližně do roku 2030.
articles.title: CentOS Stream 10 vychází s jádrem 6.12, zato bez X.Org a dalších balíčků

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Poptávka po IT odbornících v oblasti kvality a testování softwaru roste. Vývojáři se snaží psát kód tak, aby fungoval správně, ale mohou přehlédnout některé chyby. Taková chyba ale může způsobit velké problémy. Tester je proto nepostradatelnou součástí vývojového procesu a je zásadním prvkem vývoje softwaru. Dívá se na software z pohledu uživatele a pomáhá vše ladit k dokonalosti.
articles.title: Testing Akademie: naučte se testovat kvalitu softwaru v online kurzu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na serveru GOG.com začaly zimní slevy. U té příležitosti je možné získat zdarma hru The Whispered World: Special Edition. Jde o klikací adventuru od Daedalic Entertainment. Ve fantasy hře jste Sandwick, který ve snech vidí modrou kouli a konec světa. Ve hře se konci světa snaží zabránit.
articles.title: Hra zdarma na GOG.com The Whispered World

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: PeoplePath)
articles.description: Společnost PeoplePath pořádá v Plzni workshopy na různá IT témata. Tentokrát bylo téma „The One Billion Row Challenge: je PHP rychlejší než Java?“ a byl pořízen videozáznam.
articles.title: Video z workshopu The One Billion Row Challenge: je PHP rychlejší než Java?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Ve čtvrtek 19. prosince se uskuteční OWASP Czech chapter meeting, který po delší době zavítá do Prahy. Registrovaným jako vždy nabídne přísun zajímavostí z oblasti IT bezpečnosti a to ve formě tří večerních přednášek, na které je registrace zcela zdarma. Detaily programu a možnost se registrovat naleznete na Eventbrite.
articles.title: Pozvánka na OWASP Czech chapter meeting 19. prosince v Praze

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V dubnu letošního roku oznámila společnost SiFive vývojářskou desku HiFive Premier P550 používající procesor s architekturou RISC-V. V dodávkách nové desky P550 došlo ke zpoždění, ale firma prý už s výrobou pokročila a nyní je připravena dodávat předinstalované Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. SiFive spolupracuje se společností Canonical a výrobce tak slibuje dobrou podporu.
articles.title: HiFive Premier P550 s RISC-V snižuje cenu a nabídne Ubuntu 24.04 LTS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Josh Aas, výkonný ředitel organizace Internet Security Research Group, která stojí za projektem Let’s Encrypt zveřejnil výroční veřejný dopis, ve kterém informoval o aktuálním stavu certifikační autority a výhledu do nejbližší budoucnosti.
articles.title: Let’s Encrypt příští rok nabídne certifikáty se šestidenní platností

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Zdeněk Brůna, technický ředitel sdružení CZ.NIC, zveřejnil statistiky aukcí domén za prvních šest měsíců jejich provozu. Do aukce se dostanou zrušené nebo zaniklé domény, které se nově neuvolňují k další registraci, ale putují do dražby. Více v článku CZ.NIC spouští aukce domén, běží veřejné testování.
articles.title: Za půl roku bylo vydraženo 2 803 domén v .CZ, zájem je jen o každou třicátou nabízenou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Elektronyk)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili AlmaLinux 10 Beta. Zatímco AlmaLinux OS Kitten 10 pokračuje ve následování CentOS Stream 10, tak AlmaLinux 10 beta následuje Red Hat Enterprise Linux 10 b	eta vydaný před pár dny.
articles.title: Vyšel AlmaLinux 10 beta založený na RHEL 10 beta

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V září jsme o novém emulátoru terminálu Ptyxis GNOME vývojáře Christiana Hergerta psali v Softwarové sklizni. Na konci října vydaná Fedora 41 už jej používá jako výchozí a ke stejnému kroku se podle všeho blíží Ubuntu, minimálně jej zvažuje.
articles.title: Ptyxis možná bude výchozím terminálem i v Ubuntu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Předvánoční verze OpenMandrivy je zde a s ní i plný přechod této distribuce na Qt6 prostředí. Vedle Plasmy 5, aktuálního GNOME či COSMIC 1.0 alpha nabízí verze 24.12 hlavně čtyřkombinaci KDE Plasma 6.2.4 + KDE Applications 24.08.3 + KDE Frameworks 6.8.0 + Qt 6.8.0, případně pro méně zmlsané zájemce o Qt6 také novou verzi desktopu LXQt, již na bázi této verze Qt.
articles.title: OpenMandriva ROME 24.12 nabízí jádro 6.12, KDE Plasma 6 či Chromium včetně JPEG XL a GIMP 3.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Zajímá vás moderní přístup ke službám a témata jako Docker, kontejnery, cloud, virtualizace a Kubernetes? Připravili jsme pro vás čtyřdenní kurz Docker s Kubernetes, na který můžete získat dotaci až 82 % od Úřadu práce. Kontaktujte naši kolegyni pavla.hettnerova@iinfo.cz. K dotaci se musíte přihlásit do 19. prosince.
articles.title: Čtyřdenní kurz Docker s Kubernetes dotovaný Úřadem práce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Už i otevřený firmware pro základní desku MSI PRO Z790-P WIFI přináší v nové verzi opravu řešící nestabilitu běhu posledních generací CPU Intel Raptor Lake. Nechybí podpora provádění aktualizací a migrace nastavení či aktualizace mikrokódu CPU rodin Alder Lake i Raptor Lake (aktuálně používá verzi 0×12B), dále podpora dual TPM či nové konfigurační menu pro CPU.
articles.title: Nový firmware Dasharo pro MSI PRO Z790-P a PRO Z690-A řeší nejen stabilitu CPU Raptor Lake

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Vánoce, Vánoce přicházejí… A s nimi i vánoční nabídka od Goodoffer24, která je skutečně skvělá, pokud hledáte jak a kde nakoupit klíče na doživotní licenci Windows nebo Office. Zejména klíč na Windows 11 je dnes nejžádanější, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Vánoční Windows 11 za €20 a Office €24 jen jednou za rok Goodoffer24

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nová metoda nabízí efektivnější vyhledávání dat z dlouhodobých datových úložišť na bázi syntetických polymerů. Bezpečnostní trendy pro rok 2025: zločinecké kouřové clony a demokratizace kyberútoků. Efektivní ukládání dat pomocí technologie ePMR. Fortinet pokračuje v rozšiřování generativní umělé inteligence napříč svým portfoliem. Jak naučit modely umělé inteligence efektivně spolupracovat.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Jak naučit modely umělé inteligence efektivně spolupracovat

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 50/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V Evropě vzniknou „továrny“ na umělou inteligenci, Česko bude jejich součástí. Důkazy o primordiálních černých dírách se mohou skrývat v planetkách, nebo dokonce v běžných objektech na Zemi.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Protonové baterie mohou mít proti lithiu řadu výhod

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled listopadových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za listopad 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: HP Wolf Security nabízí ochranu firemních počítačů před fyzickými kybernetickými útoky. ČSÚ: Tržby v ICT sektoru loni přesáhly bilion Kč. Cloudový trh nejen roste, ale tempo se navíc ještě zrychluje. Nasazení AI vyžaduje týmové úsilí. Jak řešit nedostatek dovedností v kyberbezpečnosti v malých a středně velkých podnicích.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Podle ČSÚ tržby v ICT sektoru loni přesáhly bilion Kč

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 49/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Vesmír v krabici: Slabiny simulační hypotézy. Lingvisté z Olomouce personalizují jazyk umělé inteligence. Jak se vyznat v algoritmech pro kvantové počítače? Sledovali tanec elektronů v záři explodujících neutronových hvězd.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Mozek je jako fraktál a systém poblíž fázového přechodu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Bez člověka u počítače kvalitní AI nevybudujete, říká regionální šéf Dell Technologies. Agenti AI a lidé budou společně pracovat na úspěchu u zákazníků. GFI Software: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva. Nový Red Hat Device Edge snižuje latenci a zefektivňuje úlohy AI na okraji sítě. Portworx umožní zrychlení úloh v systému Kubernetes. Fortinet posiluje umělou inteligenci u ochrany dat a řízení vnitřních rizik.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Jsme u výprodeje na Black Friday. Ceny u Goodoffer24 jsou opravdu skvělé, když se podíváte na standardní koupi jejich doživotních licencí. Během výprodeje na Black Friday je cena výrazně snížena jak pro Windows, tak pro Office, zejména u klíče na  Windows 11, což je dnes nejoblíbenější produkt.
articles.title: Jen jednou za rok můžete na Black Friday získat u Goodoffer24 doživotní licenci na Windows 11 za €20 a Office za €24!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 48/2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Projekt OpenStreetMap řeší hardwarový problém. Databáze je aktuálně jenom pro čtení. Vše by mělo být zcela funkční ve středu 18. prosince.
articles.title: OpenStreetMap řeší  hardwarový problém. Databáze je aktuálně jenom pro čtení

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Rodrigo Arias Mallo se rozepsal o 25 letech webového prohlížeče Dillo. Aktuální verze Dilla je 3.1.1 z června letošního roku.
articles.title: 25 let webového prohlížeče Dillo

articles.author: Axians Slovakia
articles.description:
V utorok 17. 12. 2024 o 10:00 bude spustený zimný webinár zdarma. Na tomto webinári si ukážeme, prečo je toto nové vydanie dôležité a čo nové prináša. Prevedieme vás vylepšenými možnosťami vizualizácie údajov, vylepšenými funkciami monitorovania a ukážeme množstvo nových šablón navrhnutých tak, aby posunuli kvalitu vášho monitoringu na vyššiu úroveň.

Tento webinár je pre začínajúcich aj skúsenejších administrátorov Zabbixu, ktorí chcú poznať ďalšie možnosti konfigurácie Zabbix v súvislosti s novým vydaním.

Registrácia na stránke: Axians Slovakia

Zoznam všetkých webinárov: Axians Slovakia webináre
articles.title: Webinár Zdarma: Čo nové prináša Zabbix 7.2

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Rakudo (Wikipedie), tj. překladač programovacího jazyka Raku (Wikipedie), byl vydán ve verzi #178 (2024.12). Programovací jazyk Raku byl dříve znám pod názvem Perl 6.
articles.title: Rakudo #178 (2024.12)

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: Desktopové prostředí Xfce 4.20 bylo vydáno. Přináší experimentální podporu Waylandu. Podrobnosti v seznamu změn.
articles.title: Xfce 4.20

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Organizace Apache Software Foundation (ASF) vydala verzi 24 integrovaného vývojového prostředí a vývojové platformy napsané v Javě NetBeans (Wikipedie). Přehled novinek na GitHubu. Instalovat lze také ze Snapcraftu a Flathubu.
articles.title: Apache NetBeans 24

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Na GOG.COM probíhá Winter Sale 2024. Při té příležitosti lze každý den do konce roku najít v kalendář uprostřed stránky Winter Sale 2024 nějaké překvapení. Otevření balíčku s překvapením vždy ve tři odpoledne. Prvním překvapením byla hra The Whispered World: Special Edition zdarma.
articles.title: Na GOG.COM do konce roku každý den překvapení

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara

With the help of Grezzo, Nintendo finally provided. However, a lot was done to make her feel distinct from series’ mainstay hero, Link. Instead of just slapping a sword into Zelda’s hand, she’s given the power to copy and paste many items and monsters from the worl…

Screenshot via Destructoid


If you're browsing the eShop unaware of what Unpacking is, you might just think you're looking at a game with a deluxe edition and a bunch of add-ons. It's weird that the supposedly deluxe edition of Unpacking would be for sale for a fourth of the price of the base version, but stranger mistakes have been made in the history of online storefronts. Still, if you look at the fonts used on the thumbnail, you'll notice they are very different from the ones prese…
articles.title: Unpacking developer slams the Nintendo eShop for allowing scammy copycats

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
More than 100K players returned to Helldivers 2 to bring a swift, democratic ass-kicking to the Illuminate, and somehow clawed back a victory in their first defense campaign. The faction has left the galactic map, where they'll never be seen again. Right?


After months of teases, rumors, and community-led scuttlebutt surrounding it, the Illuminate faction finally appeared in Helldivers 2 and was just as quickly shown the door. The weekend saw 150K Helldivers 2 players on Steam fighting the Illuminate campaign on Calypso. After three days, Helldivers won the campaign with a margin of only 0.1%. 




After reclaiming the planet, the Illuminate disappeared. Granted, it wasn't exactly easy to kick the squids back to the void. The fight was a bit too close, claiming 38 million divers. Regardless, Super Earth made one hell of a statement. 




Welcome to Super Erf


Helldivers 2 players are gluttons for punishment, and many are asking about the next deadly wave. I mean, Calypso was liberated so quickly that some were a bit disappointed. By that, I don't mean they weren't fun to fight. They were. But it just happened so fast. I hoped to get more games in this weekend, but the campaign was over before I realized it. I know I'm not the only one.




Of course, the Illuminate will stage a comeback. The first battle certainly feels like the alien faction was testing the waters. Helldivers 2 players will certainly see the Illuminate return for a bigger swing, but next time they'll have fresh wheels. Fast Recon Vehicles will be available to purchase as a new Stratagem within the next few days. The latest Warbond, Urban Legends, comes with a new vehicle pattern (skin) for when that happens. 


Until then, Helldivers 2 players will have to be patient some more. We've finished the appetizer; the main course is on the way.

The post Over 100K Helldivers 2 players returned to the game to fight the Illuminate invasion, and barely won appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Over 100K Helldivers 2 players returned to the game to fight the Illuminate invasion, and barely won

articles.author: Tiago Manuel
articles.description:
Sonic The Hedgehog 3, starring Jim Carrey as Dr. Eggman, Jim Carrey as the other Dr. Eggman, and featuring Keanu Reeves as Shadow comes out in only a few days, but its release is being threatened by a bunch of massive spoilers that are now infesting the Internet. 


To mitigate the damages, Paramount Pictures is responding by asking fans to not spoil the movie, as that would disappoint Shadow. 




I'm not sure if this the character to go with for such a campaign, as Shadow seems to exist in a perpetual state of disappointment, but this worked well with the "Don't spoil Endgame" campaign by Marvel a few years ago, and the Sonic movie series has earned a lot of favor among fans, so let's see how it plays out.


The studio has un uphill battle ahead, though, as even the post credits scene is already out there for anyone to see. I won't put it here, and I ask that you don't go looking for it, either. Just trust me when I say that it does set up some pretty cool things for the future of the series. I believe even Eggman would agree with me on this one.




Five years ago, after the release of the original Sonic trailer — the one with the weird-looking Sonic — no one could have predicted the Sonic movie series to be the one that would break the video game adaptation curse. Not only was the original Sonic movie way more fun that it needed to be, it spawned a trilogy that seemingly keeps on getting better with each installment. 


Sonic The Hedgehog 3 opens on December 20.



The post Beware: Massive Sonic 3 spoilers are out, including the post credits scene appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Beware: Massive Sonic 3 spoilers are out, including the post credits scene

It was a year of tough competition in the Indie Games market. With toolsets that make solo-developing a much more realistic prospect than it has been for the past couple of decades, more creative folks are jumping into the deep end to deliver their vision. But the award can only go to one, and it’s Billy Basso’s subdued metroidvania.

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Brawl Stars offers a variety of Assassin types to choose from, including the elite Lily. However, like many characters, it's crucial to equip suitable abilities to give them much more power. In this guide, we'll show you the best Lily build to use in Brawl Stars.


What is the best build for Lily in Brawl Stars?


To get the best Lily build in Brawl Stars, choose the following techniques:



Gadget: Vanish


Gear: Shield


Star Power: Spiky


Gear 2: Gadget Charge



Lily's Vanish ability may be the best Gadget in Brawl Stars, allowing you to vanish to the Shadow Realm for three seconds. It's useful for quick getaways or when you want to perform a sneak attack. As for the Star Power, go with Spiky, granting 530 more damage after teleporting. Although the other Star Power, Vigilance, does provide a nice speed boost, I always like enhancing damage rates for quicker takedowns.


If you want to teleport, unleash Lily's Flourish Super by throwing a seed in a straight line. Once it hits an enemy, you'll teleport shortly after, perfect for the Spiky Star Power.


Screenshot by Destructoid


For Gadgets, you can attach the Shield to gain 900 extra health, which regenerates every 10 seconds. Lily's default build isn't exactly the best health-wise, so using a Gadget like this can help prolong her survivability. Besides the Shield, utilize the Gadget Charge for another shot at the Vanish ability. Since it's an exceptional skill, you will want to use it any chance you get.


As an Assassin Brawler, Lily's strength lies in your approach. Avoiding direct confrontation initially, you can leverage her teleport and Vanish ability to execute sneak attacks with finesse. This strategic use of her abilities puts you in control of the battlefield, allowing you to dictate the pace of the game. Additionally, if you want to see more best-of builds, check out our guides on Surge and Kenji. 

The post Best Lily build in Brawl Stars appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Best Lily build in Brawl Stars

The Globetrotters Challenge 1 SBC is now live in EA FC 25, and you can complete it to earn a fodder pack for free of cost.

EA FC 25 Globetrotters Challenge 1 SBC tasks


The Globetrotters Challenge 1 SBC has a single task, and here are the conditions. 


Task 1 - Globetrotters Challenge 1 SBC



Min. Leagues in Squad: 3


Max. 3 Players from the same Club


Min. 2 Players: Rare


Min. 10 Players: Gold


Min. Squad Total Chemistry Points: 29



EA FC 25 Globetrotters Challenge 1 SBC solutions


You'll want to use items that are already available in your Ultimate Team, which will automatically reduce the completion cost. However, the chemistry requirement might make things a bit tricky, and you can avoid that by using the following solution. 



Hack LW 76


Jone Amezaga ST 77


Endemann RW 76


Melendo CM 76


Harsch CM 76


Hausicke CDM 75


Nazareth Martin LB 64


Beyer CB 76


Aritz Elustondo CB 79


Lucia Rodriguez RB 78


Blaswich GK 77



You'll get a Rare Mixed Players Pack after completing the challenge, which includes four each of Bronze, Silver, and Gold items. All the items are of Rare type, and the pack guarantees one item rated 81 or higher. Naturally, there's plenty of exciting cards that you might end up with from the pack, so make sure to complete the SBC before it expires from Ultimate Team.

Another Pro Open Mystery Nation objective is available in EA FC 25, and you can complete a simple task for a bonus pack and coins booster.


If you're not aware about the concept, the Mystery Nation objective requires you to compete a single task in any Ultimate Team mode. However, there's a key point you need to keep in mind as the player you use to complete it must be from the nation. As expected, the exact nation is yet to be revealed, which will be disclosed during the Matchday 4 stream. 


Disclaimer: Article has been updated with the nation. 


EA FC 25 Pro Open Mystery Nation objective guide


As usual, the objective went live at 6 p.m. UK time. Here's the task that has to be completed, and do note that the job can be done in any Ultimate Team mode. 



Score three goals using a Finesse Shot with a player from the mystery nation in any UT game mode. The name of the nation will be hinted at during the broadcast of FC Pro Open Matchday 4."




Once the nation is revealed, you'll need to use any card who has the same country, and complete the objective. As usual, the objective is going to be available for only 24 hours, so make sure to complete it as soon as possible. You'll get a Prime Electrum Players Pack, and a 1,000 coin boost for 5 games. 


Over the course of the last three matchdays, the community was able to decipher the mystery nation before it was officially revealed on the stream. So far, we have had a varied list covering different continents in the form of Colombia, Croatia, and Cameroon. 


There's a strong chance that the mystery nation might be from North America or Oceania, but it's best to wait for the official reveal. We will update the mystery nation once it gets solved by the community or officially revealed on the stream. 


Based on the community, this matchday's mystery nation is United States. 

The post EA FC 25 Pro Open Mystery Nation Revealed (Matchday 4) appeared first on Destructoid.

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The 12 Days of Giving event has begun in NBA 2K25, and you can get a few amazing rewards over the next couple of weeks to help your MyTeam and MyCareer progression.


This is a yearly tradition from 2K, who offer plenty of freebies ahead of the Christmas period. All the items are naturally available for free, and getting them is pretty easy. The only concern is to get the rewards before they expire, as the 12 Days of Giving event will be a time-limited campaign. Let's take a look at the first offering, which is now available for you to obtain.


How to get the 12 Days of Giving items in NBA 2K25


It seems that 2K is following the same tradition this year, and all the offerings will be in the form of codes. If you've redeemed codes in the past, you'll be well aware of how to do it. If you haven't here are the steps, and it's pretty simple. Before we begin, make sure that you're logged into your 2K account inside the game.



Open your game and let it load.


Go to the MyTeam option.


Select the Market tab on the top of your screen.


Select the Locker Codes option, and a text box will open.


Enter the code from the list mentioned here.


Confirm to get all your rewards.



After redeeming the code, the rewards will be sent to your in-game store in the form of packs.




All NBA 2K25 12 Days of Giving code


As of writing, we have only one code that has been presented by 2K. All the codes that will be released over the next few days will be updated and added to this list.



12DAYS-GOTG-OPTION-PACK: You'll get a Gems of the Game Option pack with five items. All five items will be of Amethyst rarity, and you can choose the one you like the most.


2XP-MT-CONS-12DAYS: Double XP MT


12DAYS-OF-POLAR: Custom cardigan



It will be interesting to find out what 2K hands us next. Last year, there were some cool Christmas-themed cosmetics, and that might be the case once again this year.

The post NBA 2K25 12 Days of Giving: How to get all free items appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: NBA 2K25 12 Days of Giving: How to get all free items

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If you're a Final Fantasy 14 player who has been hoping for a nice Christmas present, the Snowstreamer mount can be unlocked as part of the new Twitch Support-A-Streamer Campaign event.


This is a really unique opportunity for both the players and those who stream the game, and it's part of Twitch's partnership with the game. Its launch coincides with the Starlight Celebration event, and there's never been a better time to watch the gameplay content on Twitch. Let's take a look at how you can unlock this unique mount and how long it will be available.


How to get the Snowstreamer mount in Final Fantasy 14


For starters, you'll need a Twitch account, so go and create one (or login to your existing account). Next, start watching a Twitch Partnered streamer or one affiliated with the game. If you don't have anyone in mind, just search using 'Final Fantasy XIV Online'.


Once you start watching the streams, the next task is to gift three subscriptions of any tier to the subscribers. The cheapest option is to go for a Tier One subscription, and yes, the mount isn't technically available for free.


There are some freedoms - you don't have to buy and gift the three subscriptions all at once. The subscriptions can also be of different tiers. Just make sure that the purchase and gifting take place till the Twitch Support-A-Streamer Campaign Event is live. Otherwise, it won't count. The event is available till December 31, 2024, and a code will be available in your inbox once you've sent all three gifts.




Once you've got the code, log in to your Final Fantasy 14 Mog Station website with your Square Enix account. Make sure that it's tied with your main in-game account in case you have multiple ones before redeeming the code. Once redeemed, you'll get the rewards via the Moogle Mail in the game. If you find it missing, make sure to restart the game once.

The post How to unlock the Snowstreamer Mount in Final Fantasy 14 (Twitch Support-A-Streamer Campaign Event) appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to unlock the Snowstreamer Mount in Final Fantasy 14 (Twitch Support-A-Streamer Campaign Event)

articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
Black Ops 6 players are encountering a new 2901 error when they enter matchmaking. This error pops up “Lobby not found,” especially if you are an Xbox Game Pass user. This error usually pops up when there’s a problem with connecting to the game servers or something on your end isn’t working right. 


Luckily, there are a few things you can try to fix things and get back into the game. Here are all the possible fixes for the lobby not found error in Black Ops 6.


All possible fixes for Black Ops 6 lobby not found error (2901)


Turn on the crossplay from the settings


Image via Activision


If you are a console user, then you should definitely turn on the crossplay so that you can match up with more users in the game. By default, it is on, but if you have turned it off, then you should consider turning it back on. In case you don’t know where the crossplay settings are, here are the steps for it:



Step 1: Open the Black Ops 6.


Step 2: Now open the menu and head to the settings.


Step 3: Once the settings are opened, go to Accounts & Network and there you can find the crossplay settings.



Restart the game


I know it sounds basic, but you can restart the game as it can sometimes clear up any temporary issues causing the error.


Update the game


Make sure that you have installed the latest patch. Sometimes this error happens if you are running an outdated version of the game.


Reinstall the game


If none of the above fixes work, then you should reinstall the game. It is a last resort, but it may fix any deeper issues with corrupted files. However, I would recommend waiting for a developer announcement regarding this error.

The post Black Ops 6 lobby not found error (2901): All possible fixes appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Black Ops 6 lobby not found error (2901): All possible fixes

articles.author: Franklin Bellone Borges
articles.description:
Precision is a key factor when taking the field in Marvel Rivals, as one misclick can lead to your — and in the worst-case scenario — your team's demise. But what can you do when, unfortunately for many players, one default setting seems to be making that a common occurrence? Here's how to turn off mouse acceleration in Marvel Rivals, as well as what exactly the setting does.


How to turn off mouse acceleration in Marvel Rivals


As there's currently no way to turn off the setting from within the game, the only sure way to turn off mouse acceleration in Marvel Rivals requires you to head straight to its files. You can do that by first heading to AppData\Local\Marvel. Once there, head to Safe, Config, and then to Windows before doing the following:



Select GameUserSettings


Open the file


Add the following lines to the file as shown below. Make sure to add them at the end to avoid any disruptions.

[/script/engine.inputsettings]


bEnableMouseSmoothing=False


bViewAccelerationEnabled=False




Close the file after making sure your changes are saved and then boot Marvel Rivals.



Keep in mind that although disabling the feature has yet to be pinpointed as the main cause for any ban, the way you cannot do so in-game can open you up for it. So make sure to take your time if you are not 100% sure.


How Does Mouse Acceleration Work?


True to its name, Mouse Acceleration is a feature present in most modern games that boosts the range in which your cursor will move based on the speed at which you move your mouse. That can then lead to a huge decrease in precision, especially when in high-stakes situations, where having the same movement yield different results is never a good thing.


Now that you know how to disable mouse acceleration in Marvel Rivals, I also highly recommend checking out the best settings for max FPS in the game, so that you can further tune in your experience as you climb the ranks.

The post How to turn off mouse acceleration in Marvel Rivals appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to turn off mouse acceleration in Marvel Rivals

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
For over a decade, The Pirate Bay has been accepting Bitcoin donations. In dollar terms, this provided a relatively modest but consistent revenue stream. However, if the torrent site had held onto its early Bitcoin, it could have amassed a small fortune, worth $14 million today. The same applies to BitcoinTorrentz, which once charged today's equivalent of $8,000 per gigabyte transferred.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: The Pirate Bay’s Million-Dollar Bitcoin Donations: Hidden Goldmine or Spent Treasure?

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan-based anti-piracy group CODA is reporting new successes in its overseas efforts to disrupt access to pirate sites. Earlier this month, operators of pirate anime sites in Brazil received in-person visits from CODA, acting on behalf of three major Japanese anime producers. CODA reports that Bakashi.tv, the third most-visited anime site in Brazil, shut down among 15 in total. No other sites are officially named, but our unofficial list provides a few pointers.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Japanese Anime Companies Shut Down Another 15 Pirate Sites in Brazil

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Red One' tops the chart, followed by 'Venom: The Last Dance'. 'Heretic' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 12/16/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The first pirate site blocking order in Canada was 'discontinued' this week. The plaintiffs, including rightsholders Bell and Rogers, won't request an extension of the landmark blocking measures against IPTV service GoldTV. Interestingly, many of the targeted domains are still online. No reason was provided for the discontinuation, but costs and changed priorities likely play a role.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Canada’s First Pirate Site Blocking Order Quietly Expires

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a recent filing at the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals, ISP Cox maintains that DMCA subpoenas don't apply to Internet providers. Several movie studios hope to convince the court otherwise, as that would strengthen their piracy enforcement efforts, making it easier to identify online pirates. According to Cox, however, Congress clearly excluded ISPs from this legal 'shortcut'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox to Appeals Court: DMCA Subpoenas Don’t Apply to Us, Period

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In an ongoing escalation of its fight against online sports piracy, media giant Canal+ secured court orders compelling DNS providers Quad9 and Vercara to block access to pirate streaming sites in France. Quad9 says that it's determined to appeal what it sees as an absurd application of copyright law. For now, however, it will block the targeted domain names globally.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Piracy Blocking Order Goes Global, DNS Service Quad9 Vows to Fight

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italy's Piracy Shield IPTV blocking system is back in the news today after yet another completely avoidable blocking blunder. On Monday night, yet another CDN IP address was added to the blocklist rendering innocent sites unavailable. Italian tech news site DDaY, a long-standing critic of Piracy Shield's indiscriminate blocking, was among those affected.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield Blacks Out Tech News Site by Blocking Another CDN IP

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Trouble continues for the popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy. After several technical issues last week, the site has become unreachable. At the same time, the related 'TGxGoodies' uploader accounts at other torrent sites have been inactive for days. TorrentGalaxy switched owners earlier this year, but it's unclear what's behind the recent problems. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy’s Troubles Silence Popular Upload Bots (Update)

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Music streaming app Musi claims Apple removed its app from the App Store after "backroom conversations" with key music industry players.  The app developer alleges this was an "unfair" and "tainted" removal process designed to put it out of business.  Musi is seeking a preliminary injunction to reinstate its app while the legal battle plays out. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Musi Decries Apple’s App Store Removal: A “Backroom Scheme” with Music Industry (Update)

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Indie videgame portal Itch.io is effectively offine today after a brand protection company reported the platform for "fraud/phishing" for what was a problem easily solved using a DMCA notice. According to Google's transparency databases, the same company has repeatedly attempted to use the DMCA to solve alleged trademark infringement but had its complaints rejected.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bogus Complaint Disables Itch.io, Google Ignored Same Sender For Years

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cloudflare is actively disabling access to some pirate site URLs on its network, informing visitors that the requested pages are unavailable for legal reasons. While these types of 'HTTP 451' error messages are relatively rare, they are nothing more than Cloudflare complying with its legal obligations under the DMCA.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare Blocks Pirate Site URLs “For Legal Reasons”

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Greece is buzzing with news of a historic, landmark decision by a local court, to imprison a person for five months for subscribing to a pirate IPTV service. The news warrants an informed conversation about creators' rights and how the judicial system has sharpened its response to piracy. However, until evidence is produced to the contrary, the story should be stamped "propaganda" and noted for an offense of its own: a distraction from genuine progress in the fight against piracy.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Historic Decision’ to Imprison Pirate IPTV User Smells of Propaganda

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a bid to identify individuals allegedly involved in creating and distributing cheats for the video game Destiny 2, Bungie has subpoenaed the U.S.-based cryptocurrency exchange Kraken.  The subpoena seeks to identify the owner of a Bitcoin wallet, who is believed to be a European resident. This individual, however, is contesting the subpoena, claiming it violates EU privacy laws and other regulations.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bungie Targets Bitcoin Wallet in Effort to Expose ‘Destiny 2’ Cheaters

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The ACE anti-piracy coalition sidelined dozens of sports streaming sites this week with action against dozens of domain names including Crackstream and various Streameast clones. The official Streameast was targeted by the U.S. Government earlier this year, but the copycat takedowns are just as important, as these sites drew more traffic than the original.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Seizes Sports Piracy Domains including Crackstream and Streameast Clones

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Hidden pirate features within seemingly harmless apps, known as "stealth apps," are slipping past Apple's App Store security, offering users access to pirated movies and TV shows.  Taiwan's Criminal Police Bureau recently busted three individuals promoting unlock instructions for these apps to roughly 400,000 users.  Surprisingly, this tech-savvy scheme was orchestrated by a group whose combined age totals 215 years.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Apple Stealth Piracy App Trio, Combined Age 215 Years, Face $18.5m Damages Claim

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan's Cultural Affairs Agency is looking towards AI to strengthen the country's battle against rampant online piracy. The pilot program proposed by the agency would see culturally significant manga and anime content protected by automated image and text recognition systems, with less reliance placed on resource-intensive human intervention.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Japan Plans AI Pilot Program to Fight Manga & Anime Piracy

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
MP3.to is a nifty online tool that allows users to convert MP3s to dozens of other file formats. While these conversions don't knowingly violate any law, Spanish music industry group Promusicae reportedly labeled the service an audio download tool. In response, Google removed the URL from its search engine and banned the associated AdSense account.  However, after the MP3 site involved its lawyer, Google reversed its decision.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MP3.to Successfully Challenges Music Industry’s ‘False’ DMCA Circumvention Takedown

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
A 42-year-old man was arrested in a recent UK crackdown on illegal IPTV suppliers, with a special mention for 'illicit Firesticks'.  Local police, in collaboration with anti-piracy group FACT, also sent cease and desist letters to thirty other suspects. While FACT warns that pirate operators risk criminal penalties, there appears to be no end in sight for the streaming piracy whack-a-mole.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: UK Police and FACT Continue IPTV Piracy Whack-a-Mole

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A long-running lawsuit against pirate set-top box distributor Jadoo TV, launched by DISH Network and coordinated by the International Broadcaster Coalition Against Piracy, has ended with a $24.9m judgment in favor of the plaintiffs. In addition to the imminent shutdown of the IPTV service, domain names, trademarks, and all customer lists will be handed over to DISH.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Jadoo TV Piracy Lawsuit Ends in $24.9m Judgment, Customers Exposed

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (sev)

Wait for it! Issue 3. Song for a Hare. (Ну, погоди! Выпуск 3. Песня для зайца)
Mask Show. (Маски-шоу)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat. (Три маленькие белые мышки. Визит Морской крысы)
The Adventures of the Good Soldier Schweik. (Похождения бравого солдата Швейка)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday. (Три маленькие белые мышки. День рождения морской крысы)
Besides these newly supported games, almost half of the current 108 engines have notable changes. Thus, testing more games is always a good thing.
All testing must be done with stable builds, not development ones. Please report bugs or oddities on our issue tracker.
A detailed list of all exciting new features and fixes is available in our NEWS file.
We are looking forward to your reports about successful and unsuccessful playthroughs and bugs reported!
>
articles.title: Help us to test the upcoming ScummVM 2.9.0!

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: "Bohužel" tento film není tak špatný, aby byl zábavný. Je to jen nuda, která není vůbec ničím zajímavá. Takhle nějak si představuji, že budou vypadat stoprocentně AI generované filmy. Nejzajímavější a nejzábavnější je malá role Russella Crowea.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Lovec Kraven [Kraven The Hunter] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Někdo napsal scénář s cool zápletkami a dialogy, někdo vymodeloval úžasná prostředí, někdo složil hudbu a nahrál dialogy skoro jako John Williams a Harrison Ford... To všechno funguje velmi dobře. Ale je to proloženo otravnou hrou, kde pořádně nefunguje boj, stealth ani puzzly, a jejíž interaktivita zdržuje od toho cool příběhu.
articles.title: Skororecenze: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Za pár dní má v našich kinech (a po celém světě) premiéru "remasterovaná verze" kultovní animované podívané Interstella 5555. A je důležité říct si něco o tom, o jakou podívanou vlastně jde a v čem přesně spočívá ten "remaster".
U zrodu tohoto počinu stálo elektronické hudební duo Daft Punk, které v roce 2001 vydalo své album "Discovery". K písničkám z alba vyšly animované videoklipy, které produkoval Leidži Macumoto, což byl kultovní japonský výtvarník (zemřel loni), který měl na svém kontě mnoho animovaných seriálů, především ze 70. - 80. let (nejslavnější z nich byl asi "Space Battleship Yamato"). Daft Punk ho oslovili proto, že na jeho seriálech vyrůstali, takže výsledné dílo, včetně "jednodušší" retro animace a naivní zápletky zcela záměrně připomíná staré japonské televizní počiny (n…
articles.title: Recenze: Daft Punk & Leiji Matsumoto's Interstella 5555 - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Pokud zbožňujete stejnojmenný divadelní muzikál, funguje tento film pravděpodobně velmi dobře. Pokud ho vůbec neznáte, budete ve výrazné nevýhodě, a to z vícero důvodů. Přestože mám muzikály rád, téměř vůbec se u mě nedostavil jakýkoliv pocit dojetí nebo jiná silná emoce a z písniček si téměř nic nepamatuji. Což je bizarní, protože zbožňuji písničky v "Princi egyptském", kterého napsal stejný autor pár let před "Čarodějkou". - Ilča 50 %
articles.title: Audio recenze: Čarodějka [Wicked - Part 1] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Naprosto nezajímavé ve všech směrech, od scénáře, přes výtvarnou podobu a písničky, až po režii. V některých aspektech horší než jednička, v žádných lepší.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Odvážná Vaiana 2 [Moana 2] - 50 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kvalitní herecké výkony, občas slušná atmosféra, ale scénář je tak děravý, že si každou chvíli říkáte "proč to proboha udělal(a)?" a místy až znemožňuje pochopit, co se právě děje (je to sofistikovaná hra, nebo jí jenom praskly nervy?). Což je diametrální rozdíl oproti skvěle promyšlenému "Tísňovému volání". (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Dozorkyně [Vogter] - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Čekal jsem od Hugha Granta v roli chlípného starce hodně, a i přesto jsem byl příjemně překvapen. Je skvělý. Scénář není hloupý a nabízí pár námětů k zamyšlení nad tím, jak funguje víra. Bohužel, ke konci se film trochu neuspořádaně rozutíká do různých směrů, jako by se tvůrci neuměli rozhodnout, o čem to vlastně celé bylo. (Ilča 65 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Heretik [Heretic] - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Mladá studentka Jindřiška přichází domů a zjišťuje, že jejich luxusní dům je v dražbě, všechen majetek v exekuci a její otec se kdesi skrývá a není k zastižení, zatímco matka netuší, co se vlastně stalo a jak otec ty dluhy nadělal, nebo o tom aspoň nechce mluvit. Debutující scenárista a režisér Vojtěch Strakatý nám přináší drama děvčete, které netuší, co si počít.


Existuje vícero českých filmů, které surfují na oblíbené vlně "zakažte exekutory, zrušte dluhy, je to nelidské!" (například Tancuj Matyldo). After Party takovým filmem není. Exekutoři se v něm chovají korektně a slušně a vinu na situaci celé rodiny nese naprosto jednoznačně otec, který neopatrně investoval, i když nevíme jak. A "nevíme jak" je téma, prolínající se celým tímto filmem. Takže nevíme, co vlastně otec komu naslibova…
articles.title: Recenze: After Party - 60%
